TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DecoderReplacementFallbackBuffer extends System.Text.DecoderFallbackBuffer

Docs.summary: Represents a substitute output string that is emitted when the original input byte sequence cannot be decoded. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks It might not be possible to convert an encoded byte sequence to an equivalent character if no suitable decoding exists. A common reason for a decoding to fail is that the conversion operation uses a code page that cannot represent the character to decode.
If the input byte sequence cannot be converted to an output character, a <xref:System.Text.DecoderReplacementFallback?displayProperty=fullName> object provides a replacement string that is substituted for the output character. The replacement string initializes the value of the <xref:System.Text.DecoderReplacementFallback> object, and the value of the <xref:System.Text.DecoderReplacementFallback> object initializes the value of a <xref:System.Text.DecoderReplacementFallbackBuffer> object. The value of a <xref:System.Text.DecoderReplacementFallbackBuffer> object is called the replacement fallback buffer. The conversion operation uses the replacement fallback buffer to emit a replacement string instead of a decoded character, then continues to process the remainder of the input.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Text.DecoderReplacementFallback fallback) cil managed

Docs.param: A object that contains a replacement string.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the value of a object.

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool Fallback (byte[] bytesUnknown, int index);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance bool Fallback(unsigned int8[] bytesUnknown, int32 index) cil managed

Docs.param: An input byte sequence. This parameter is ignored unless an exception is thrown.
The index position of the byte in bytesUnknown. This parameter is ignored in this operation.
Docs.summary: Prepares the replacement fallback buffer to use the current replacement string.
Docs.returns: if the replacement string is not empty; if the replacement string is empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Text.Encoding.GetBytes%2A> and <xref:System.Text.Encoder.Convert%2A> methods call <xref:System.Text.DecoderReplacementFallbackBuffer.Fallback%2A> if they encounter an unknown input byte sequence that cannot be decoded. If the return value of <xref:System.Text.DecoderReplacementFallbackBuffer.Fallback%2A> is `true`, the calling method can invoke the <xref:System.Text.DecoderReplacementFallbackBuffer.GetNextChar%2A> method to obtain each character of the fallback buffer.

Docs.exception: This method is called again before the method has read all the characters in the replacement fallback buffer.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance char GetNextChar() cil managed

Docs.summary: Retrieves the next character in the replacement fallback buffer.
Docs.returns: The next character in the replacement fallback buffer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Text.Encoding.GetBytes%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Text.Decoder.Convert%2A?displayProperty=fullName> methods call <xref:System.Text.DecoderReplacementFallbackBuffer.Fallback%2A> if they encounter an unknown surrogate pair or character in their input. If the return value of <xref:System.Text.DecoderReplacementFallbackBuffer.Fallback%2A> is `true`, the calling method can invoke <xref:System.Text.DecoderReplacementFallbackBuffer.GetNextChar%2A> to obtain each character of the replacement fallback buffer.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool MovePrevious() cil managed

Docs.summary: Causes the next call to to access the character position in the replacement fallback buffer prior to the current character position.
Docs.returns: if the operation was successful; otherwise, .

Docs.summary: Gets the number of characters in the replacement fallback buffer that remain to be processed.
Docs.value: The number of characters in the replacement fallback buffer that have not yet been processed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Text.DecoderReplacementFallbackBuffer.Fallback%2A> method returns `true` if the <xref:System.Text.DecoderReplacementFallbackBuffer.Remaining%2A> property is nonzero.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Reset() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes all internal state information and data in the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Text.DecoderReplacementFallbackBuffer.Reset%2A> method discards any persisted state information and data that govern the emitting of a replacement string. Unpredictable results occur if the decoding operation continues after the <xref:System.Text.DecoderReplacementFallbackBuffer.Reset%2A> method is invoked.
